ORG_2000001 - occupies

Label

occupies

Sub property of

http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#topObjectProperty

Definition

The property that associates an organization occupies a geographical location is it has one of more people at the location, or has legal rights to the location

Definition source

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447

Domain

ORG_0000001 - organization

Range

ORG_0000045 - geographic region

Example

The Navaho Nation occupies the Navaho Nation reservation. Microsoft occupies a campus in Redmond Washington. The University of Pittsburgh occupies the Cathedral of Learning

Term editor

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447
